review: I love my kindle and was so excited to get the fire TV. I get HBO go on my kindle and I also get xfinity to go on my iPhone BUT the fire TV does not have any of this. You have the app but it won't work with xfinity. I was disappointed in that aspect of the fire TV. I do get net flix and Amazon TV.  Amizon prime which I love. The fire TV is very user friendly and I love the speak to chose option which is very convent. I sincerely hope Amizon gets licensed  to use HBO Go and xfinity to go app. Then it would be perfect.
